data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
In the minute 1, Goal kick for Lyon at Stade de la Mosson.
Montpellier are coming forward and Teji Savanier gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
In the minute 3, In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lyon are on the attack at Stade de la Mosson, where Karl Toko Ekambi is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 5, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Montpellier.
Andy Delort for Montpellier has been booked by Francois Letexier and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 8, Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
Montpellier attack but Gaetan Laborde's header doesn't find the target.
Lyon have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Francois Letexier awards Lyon a goal kick.
Lyon's Houssem Aouar gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Montpellier defender.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In the minute 11, Teji Savanier (Montpellier) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lyon.
Throw-in for Lyon close to the penalty box.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Montpellier.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Lyon's Houssem Aouar goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Montpellier have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Francois Letexier signals a throw-in for Montpellier, close to Lyon's area.
In the minute 24, Can Montpellier capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lyon's half?
Montpellier push upfield and Andy Delort gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Lyon defence.
In Montpellier Montpellier attack through Andy Delort. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 25, It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
Lyon's Karl Toko Ekambi is on target but unsuccessful.
Francois Letexier awards Montpellier a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Montpellier.
In the minute 36, Free kick Montpellier.
Lyon's Bruno Guimaraes has been booked in Montpellier.
It's advantage Montpellier in Montpellier as Teji Savanier scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Montpellier.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lyon just outside Montpellier's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Lyon in Montpellier.
In the minute 41, Tino Kadewere (Lyon) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lyon push forward at Stade de la Mosson and Tino Kadewere gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Montpellier defence.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Houssem Aouar (Lyon) has been shown a straight red card by referee Francois Letexier.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Arnaud Souquet for Montpellier who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Francois Letexier will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 45, Karl Toko Ekambi is booked for the away team.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Montpellier's Arnaud Souquet is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for Lyon at Stade de la Mosson.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lyon.
In the minute 47, Montpellier needs to be cautious. Lyon have an attacking throw-in.
Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Montpellier in the half of Lyon.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Lyon.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 51, Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
Montpellier are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Lyon at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Throw-in Lyon.
In the minute 55, Montpellier are caught offside.
The away team replace Bruno Guimaraes with Jean Lucas.
Rudi Garcia (Lyon) is making a second substitution, with Memphis Depay replacing Tino Kadewere.
In the minute 56, Lyon to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Goal kick for Lyon at Stade de la Mosson.
Montpellier needs to be cautious. Lyon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 58, Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Teji Savanier extends Montpellier's lead to 2-0.
Mihailo Ristic with an assist there.
In the minute 60, Free kick Lyon.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Lyon have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Jordan Ferri (Montpellier) gets a yellow card.
Florent Mollet is on a sub for Jordan Ferri for Montpellier.
In the minute 63, Stephy Mavididi is replacing Andy Delort for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 68, Melvin Michel Maxence Bard is replacing Jason Denayer for the away team.
Lyon make their fourth substitution with Rayan Cherki replacing Karl Toko Ekambi.
In the minute 69, Marcelo (Lyon) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Montpellier defenders.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Lyon surge into the attack at Stade de la Mosson but Joachim Andersenâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Lyon!
At Stade de la Mosson, Vitorino Hilton has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 73, Lyon drives forward and Memphis Depay gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon's Maxence Caqueret gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Montpellier's Florent Mollet breaks free at Stade de la Mosson. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Lyon at Stade de la Mosson.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Michel Der Zakarian is making the team's third substitution at Stade de la Mosson with Joris Chotard replacing Teji Savanier.
In the minute 75, Moussa Dembele is replacing Maxwel Cornet for the away team.
In Montpellier Lyon drive forward through Memphis Depay. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 76, In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Important block from the Montpellier defence as Moussa Dembele fires in a strike for Lyon.
Lyon have been given a penalty at Stade de la Mosson...
In the minute 81, He's off! Vitorino Hilton is shown a red card.
Memphis Depay's penalty pulls one back for Lyon at Stade de la Mosson.
Throw-in Lyon.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Francois Letexier awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lyon at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Gaetan Laborde with Junior Sambia. This is the fourth substitution made today by Michel Der Zakarian.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lyon have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 89, Marcelo (Lyon) strikes at Stade de la Mosson but his header is cleared.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Lyon's Moussa Dembele attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Marcelo (Lyon) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Montpellier.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Montpellier.
Moussa Dembele for Lyon drives towards goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
